'''Bruce Phillips''' ([[13 September|September 13]], [[1951]]) played [[Grimbold]] in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''. He also played a [[Rohan]] soldier in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers|The Two Towers]]'', and served as [[Bernard Hill]]'s stand-in and stunt double in both those films.
